name: CVE-2022-3802
description: A vulnerability has been found in IBAX go-ibax and classified as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /api/v2/open/rowsInfo. The manipulation of the argument where leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212638 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
